name: Querîle
description:
Hello ! It's "La Table" and we present you our second game during a game jam. It was made during the Global Game Jam 2022 (theme : Duality) in 48h.

THE GAME

Querîle is a versus game where you attack your opponent with Bombys. Take Bombys on your island and put them on boats to send them on the opposite island. To win, get 5 of your Bombys cross the opponent's area !

CONTROLS

/!\ For QWERTY keyboard, click on the button for changing controls

The game can support a controller

The TEAM

Arthur MENSAH : Programmer, Game Design

Samuel CHOLVIN : Programmer, VFX

Adnan ESBER: Game Design, 3D, Manager
